entry.content:
What

Welcome to my blog documenting my learning journey into the "cryptoverse", or the rabbit hole that is blockchain security.

I will focus primarily focus on security related topics:

  • Blockchain security in general (blockchain or protocol agnostic)
  • Smart contract security & audits
  • Risks related to decentralized finance (DeFi)
  • Ethereum security & Ethereum virtual machine (EVM)
  • Etc.

Please make sure to use the tags to filter through the various subjects.

The more you know, the more you realize you don't know.

Why

There is currently an (extreme) shortage of knowledgeable cyber/IT/information/... security professionals in the job market, and I reckon the shortage with regards to the field of blockchain security is even more burning.

In the spirit of 'sharing is caring'¬†I want to spread my (albeit nascent) knowledge of this field, in order to inspire others.

I hope this blog helps you and others to develop your skills in this increasingly popular hyped field.
